thread.title: General Expects Results of Probe into Afghanistan Hospital Strike in 30 Days
thread.title_full: General Expects Results of Probe into Afghanistan Hospital Strike in 30 Days - WSJ

author: Felicia Schwartz
title: General Expects Results of Probe into Afghanistan Hospital Strike in 30 Days
text:
WASHINGTONâ€”Gen. John Campbell, commander of U.S. and coalition forces in Afghanistan, said he expects to have preliminary results from a Pentagon investigation into an Oct. 3 strike on a Doctors Without Borders hospital in about 30 days.
Gen. Campbell told the House Armed Services Committee on Thursday that he would provide lawmakers results of the investigation as soon as they were available.
